__e: He just... he might have gotten involved with some dangerous people, and he doesn't want you to get involved in that too, so we should go now.
Yeah, well, I think my brother is in with some very scary people, and I can't trust the police, so ethical or not, I need anything I can get on the days before my brother disappeared.
They are dangerous to what we are doing in this place and other places.
Well, it's a good thing you brought us down here because the high seas are a dangerous mistress for these children.
